dashboard.label: Endpoint Threats
dashboard.description: Monitoramento de eventos de segurança em endpoints

panel.title: Contagem de Processos Suspeitos por Host

chart.search: index=windows (EventCode=4688 OR sourcetype=xmlwineventlog) | regex CommandLine="(?i)(powershell\s+.*(hidden|encode|webclient|downloadstring|bypass))" | stats count by Computer | sort -count | head 10

index=windows EventCode=5156 | stats count by SourceAddress, DestAddress, DestPort | where NOT match(DestAddress, "^(10\.|172\.(1[6-9]|2[0-9]|3[0-1])\.|192\.168\.)") AND count < 5 | sort -count | head 10

table.search: index=windows OR index=linux sourcetype=*audit* OR sourcetype=*sysmon* | regex TargetFilename=".*(boot\.ini|win\.ini|system32|etc|passwd|shadow|hosts|sudoers).*" | stats count by host, TargetFilename, user | sort -count

index=windows (EventCode=4688 OR sourcetype=xmlwineventlog) | regex CommandLine="(?i)(powershell\s+.*(hidden|encode|webclient|downloadstring|bypass))" | table _time Computer Account CommandLine ParentProcessName | sort - _time

chart.search: index=windows EventCode=4625 OR index=linux sourcetype=*auth* | stats count by host, user, src_ip | where count > 3 | sort -count

panel.title: Logins Bem-Sucedidos por Usuário e Origem

chart.search: index=windows EventCode=4624 OR index=linux sourcetype=*auth* successful | stats count by user, src_ip | sort -count

(index=windows OR index=linux) (EventCode=4688 OR EventCode=4625 OR EventCode=4624 OR sourcetype=*audit* OR sourcetype=*sysmon*) | eval severity=case( match(CommandLine, "(?i)(powershell\s+.*(hidden|encode|webclient|downloadstring|bypass))"), "Critical", match(TargetFilename, ".*(boot\.ini|win\.ini|system32|etc|passwd|shadow|hosts|sudoers).*"), "High", EventCode=4625, "Medium", 1=1, "Low") | timechart span=1h count by severity

table.search: index=windows EventCode=4688 | where TokenElevationType="%%1936" OR TokenElevationType="TokenElevationTypeDefault" | stats count by Process, Account, Computer | sort -count | head 20
